chats.question: Description
chats.answer:
---
* This feature is responsible for rendering boxColliders on all entities.
* It maps key 'o' to switch enableRender flag on boxColliders.
* Flag enableRender is by default set to false in json data.
* Feature provides flag press once on start, witch can turn the render on by default.
* It renders border around boxColliders with color specified in component data.
* key can me mapped to keyboard keys that are mapped by keboardMapping class
* More information in data->feature->debugUI.

chats.question: KeyboardMapping
chats.answer:
* class maps inputSystem to eventSystem
* subscribes callback to inputSystem keyDown event
* callback sends events in eventSystem with pressed key and entity id that is registered in this system

chats.question: DebugRenderer
chats.answer:
* renders collision box
* velociy
* direction
* transform position
* flag enableRender from collision box controlls visibility

chats.question: KeyboardActionHandler
chats.answer:
* this class subscribe to key event
* also checks key form component data to map it to event
* KeyMap component is required in entity registered in this system, otherwise exception
* if there is no or wrong action data in json default key will be used
* this class is used in system witch is assign to key, and its injected in file engineSystem or footballSystem
